captions.text: K. N. J ~ Today is thursday! Thursday~
This is Nam Joo, the main DJ of today's OVEN RADIO
Eun Ji is here~ uh uh~
If we call our fans, they will pick up!
We rarely get to talk to our fans on the phone
It says he is joining the army soon
This is Ha Young of Apink
I will ask you some questions from now on

Q. What is Eun Ji's name in the drama,
'Trot Lover'?
Q. When was Ha Young born?
Q. What is Na Eun's blood type?
Heard you're going to army soon
Be a man and come back!
Yo.. you.. you're k..kidding.. Did I really?
Let's start the quiz right away
Q. Who's in the best friend line born in 1993?
Q. Who holds a third-degree black belt in taekwondo?

Q. Of whose character as a child did Na Eun 
play in the drama, 'The Great Seer'?
We will send you a gift
Ryu Jung Hyun, and Kim San Hyun
We will be back after the ads

Rong leader has a lot of concerns
before Apink's comeback
Listening to Apink's new album [Pink LUV] is..

Apink is known as foodporn dol 
who eats anything and everything
I'm about to go crazy right now
We will pick the queen of foodporn today
Right the concept for today was rapping

Since this is OVEN RADIO,
eating fast is also important
I want to eat it quickly
Who do you think is the winner?
I think the staffs are voting
Son Na Eun is the winner!
You can't vote for who you like the most!!!
I ate like this on purpose
How can you guys do that
Aren't you guys feeling good after eating?

Lastly, we're going to introduce a song request 
from one of our fans
I wanted to be a basket ball player

But I'm not sure if I should try out
for high school basket ball team
or study to become a PE teacher

I request the song 'I Don't Know'
because I don't know what I want

To cheer him up, we will play 'I Don't Know'
as we finish today's OVEN RADIO

title: OVEN RADIO(오븐라디오) Ep.4: Apink(에이핑크) _ LUV(러브) [ENG/JPN/CHN SUB]
